project.description: Retail store chain renovation in Miami, Florida. Project ID: FL-RT-0412-CH. Renovation of 5 retail locations across Miami-Dade County simultaneously. Per location: interior demolition and rebuild, new flooring/lighting/fixtures, POS systems and electrical, HVAC upgrades, exterior facade refresh, signage replacement. Target budget: $800K per location ($4M total, hard cap $4.5M). Target timeline: 3 months per location, all complete within 6 months. Each location closes maximum 2 weeks. Priorities: Cost control is critical. Consistency across all 5 locations is essential. Standardized quality at competitive pricing.

bids.scope: Complete renovation of all 5 retail locations with standardized package: interior demolition and rebuild, new flooring/lighting/fixtures, updated POS systems and electrical, HVAC upgrades, exterior facade refresh, signage replacement, all permits. Staggered schedule to minimize disruption. Strong multi-location project management with quality control processes to ensure consistency across all locations. Miami-Dade County experience.
Renovation of 5 retail locations with interior work, fixtures, electrical, HVAC, and exterior updates. Standardized approach across locations.
Retail store renovations at 5 locations. Basic interior and exterior improvements.
